DOC.brief_summary: Rheumatologists treat patient seronegative arthritis randomize treat patient target treat patient usual standard care . All physician perform initial chart audit . Following initial chart audit , physicians treat-to-target group receive accredit educational training . Six month initial chart audit , physician perform repeat audit see patient assess systematically treat target low disease state .
DOC.brief_title: Closing Gap Care Seronegative Inflammatory Arthritis
